column1: The  accused-appellant  was  indicted  in  the  High  Court  of  Kuliyapitya  on  two

column2: On or about 9th March 2009, at Dambadeniya within the jurisdiction of that
Court, the accused committed the offence of kidnapping a girl under age of
16 from legal guardianship punishable under Section 354 of the Penal Code

column1: 2.  The offence of grave sexual abuse punishable under Section 365 (b) (2) (b)

column2: of the Penal Code as amended by Act Nos. 22 of 1995 and 29 of 1998.
